From: Ray Ormond (b)(6): (b)(6) @bop.gov> Date: 7/23/19 11:46 AM (GMT-05:00) To: Lamine N'Diaye (b)(6): (b)(6) @bop.gov> Subject: Re: Epstein >>> "Ray Ormond" 07/23/2019 11:46 >>> Lamine - The memo is very confusing. Please draft an email of his actions and current status. Also include what plans were in motion to move him to a GP unit. It will need -------- Original message --------
From: Lamine N'Diaye (b)(6): (b)(7)(C)
Date: 7/23/19 11:12 AM ( (b)(6): (b)(6)
>>> "Lamine N'Diaye (b)(6): (b)(6) bop.gov> 07/23/2019 11:12 >>> Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone -------- Original message --------
From: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" (b)(6): (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Date: 7/23,
Subject: Fwd: Epstein
Page 158 DOJ-OGR-00027183

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain discussing Epstein, with redactions of personal information and email addresses. The text is mostly printed, with no visible handwriting or stamps. The document quality is clear, with no visible damage or redactions that obscure the content.
